Summary: Fifth Third Bancorp (FITB) faces direct legislative risk from 2 analyzed bills. Both directly impact the company, with a 1% tax increase. No indirect impacts. Overall risk: low.
SummaryKeypoints: H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act imposes 1% tax. affecting operations in United States. with short-term implementation The legislation states: "There is hereby imposed on any remittance transfer a tax equal to 1 percent of the amount of such transfer."

REGULATION (EU) 2024/1689 OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL imposes regulation. affecting operations in European Union. with short-term implementation The legislation states: "deployers of certain high-risk AI systems listed in an annex to this Regulation, such as banking or insurance entities, should carry out a fundamental rights impact assessment prior to putting it into use."
